ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Entered Crew--Intro Taunt
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the Crew Facilities for the first time and hears Luka taunting the mind-controlled humans in the cafeteria.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Entered Crew--Intro Followup
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the Crew Facilities for the first time and hears Luka taunting the mind-controlled humans in the cafeteria. These lines follow the main blast.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Entered Crew, Taunt Loops
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the Crew Facilities for the first time and hears Luka taunting the mind-controlled humans in the cafeteria. Random pool of lines.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Someone Out there?
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the cafeteria. The cook (luka's) voice comes on over the PA system. Trigger if player engages the corrupted humans outside the kitchen.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Someone Out there? #2
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the cafeteria. The cook (luka's) voice comes on over the PA system. Trigger if player engages the corrupted humans outside the kitchen.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Someone Out there? #3
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the cafeteria. The cook (luka's) voice comes on over the PA system. Trigger if player engages the corrupted humans outside the kitchen. Luka asked the player to deal with them all. Player is almost done.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Someone Out there? #4 - lot of mind-controlled humans killed.
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the cafeteria. The cook (luka's) voice comes on over the PA system. Trigger if player engages the corrupted humans outside the kitchen. Luka asked player to clear them out. All clear now so Luka will speak to the player now.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Someone Out there? #4 - only a few mind controlled humans killed.
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the cafeteria. The cook (luka's) voice comes on over the PA system. Trigger if player engages the corrupted humans outside the kitchen. Luka asked player to clear them out. All clear now so Luka will speak to the player now.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Someone Out there? #4 - no mind-controlled humans dead.
ResponseRule.description: Player enters the cafeteria. The cook (luka's) voice comes on over the PA system. Trigger if player engages the corrupted humans outside the kitchen. Luka asked player to clear them out. All clear now so Luka will speak to the player now.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Fallback Loiter Lines
ResponseRule.description: Player is near the service window, sneaking (or has made it into the kitchen) before having initially greeted.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: First Sees Player
ResponseRule.description: The cook sees the player thru the order window. Luka knows that the telepath aliens are able to take over people's minds and is suspicious of everyone. Also, since he's masquerading as the cook, he's worried someone will recognize him. But when Morgan doesn't react, he goes with the charade. In fact, the errand is just to buy some time so he can lay a trap for Morgan. (Note: Also, this task happens to send the player in the vicinity of items which provide clues about Fiona & Sam).

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Tries to Open Kitchen Door, No Humanity Quest Assigned
ResponseRule.description: Before getting Luka's humanity quest/seeing Luka for 1st Time, player tries to open the Kitchen Door.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Tries to Open Kitchen Door, Humanity Quest Assigned, Not Done
ResponseRule.description: After being given and before finishing Luka's quest, player tries to open the Kitchen Door (the door cannot be hacked).

ResponseRule.name: Luke: Player Placed Wrong Item In Tray
ResponseRule.description: Player returns to the kitchen and placed the WRONG item. In the tray.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Placed Wrong Item In Tray--Alien
ResponseRule.description: Player returns to the kitchen and placed the WRONG item. In the tray.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Has Cook Item PA
ResponseRule.description: Player finds item from Will Mitchell's room (cooking award).

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player HasCook Item CONV
ResponseRule.description: Player returns to the kitchen area with the item that the cook requested.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Click on Window, Humanity Quest Done, Not Entered Kitchen Yet.
ResponseRule.description: Player returns to the kitchen and keeps trying to click on window - hasn't entered the kitchen yet. (Optional)

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Cook Breaks Water Regulator
ResponseRule.description: Luka is making some noises while he breaks the water pressure regulator inside the kitchen. He's trying to do it sneakily before the players comes back in.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Gives Player Hydroponics Quest
ResponseRule.description: Luka points or walks player toward water closet / sink where the pipes are busted an missing a critical component--a hi-tech water pressure regulator. Luka is trying to stall and/or have the player killed by the telepath.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Leaves, Uses Kitchen Door
ResponseRule.description: Just a flavor line about keeping the kitchen secure as the player leaves and/or uses the door.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Distracted By Destroyed Operator
ResponseRule.description: Luke walks by and looks at destroyed frame Skillet.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player Destroyed Skillet
ResponseRule.description: Player broke Skillet in front of Luka, Luka reacts.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: On Loiter--Plyr In Kitchen
ResponseRule.description: Loitier lines for when the player first enters the kitchen.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: On Used--Plyr In Kitchen
ResponseRule.description: Click lines for when the player first enters the kitchen.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: On Used-- Hydroponics Quest In Progress
Luka: Hydroponics Quest In Progress--Player clicks on Freezer Door
Luka: Hydroponics Quest, Player Already Has Spare Regulator
ResponseRule.description: Player already has the spare regulator without having to go to hydroponics to find the spare part. Luka is a bit unnerved by this.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Hydroponics Quest, Player Repairs Regulator
ResponseRule.description: Player fixes the regulator without having to go to hydroponics to find the spare part. Luka is dissapointed.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Hydroponics Quest, Player Replaces Regulator
ResponseRule.description: Player fixes the regulator by installing the replacement part.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Hydroponics Quest, Luka Opens Freezer
ResponseRule.description: Player fixes the regulator by installing the replacement part. Luka is now opening the door for the player.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: On Loiter--Plyr In Kitchen After Regulator Fixed
ResponseRule.description: Lines as player loiters after the player has completed the regulator hydoponics quest.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Cook Springs Freezer Trap
ResponseRule.description: Cook has trapped the player in the freezer and is talking thru the glass. Then he departs. Note: There are two variations of the player being trapped in the freezer. Might need two variations of this convo. In the first case the player willingly walked in and the cook slammed the door behind him. The second case is far worse: the player ate some of the cook's drugged food and is waking up in the freezer, stripped of most of their gear.

ResponseRule.name: Skillet: LoiterLines
ResponseRule.description: Skillet, as she's wandering around the kitchen while the player is present.

ResponseRule.name: Skillet: OnLoiter Post Freezer Escape Apologies
Skillet: Notice Freezer Door Left Open
Skillet: Notice Player Walked Into Freezer Trap
Luka TS: Plyr Woke Up In Freezer
ResponseRule.description: Luka contacts the player shortly after waking in the freezer. Luka stole the TS of Chloe Burgess.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Deep Storage Taunt #1
ResponseRule.description: Luka taunt using Chloe Burgess TranScribe. Player is in Deep Storage.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Deep Storage Taunt #2
ResponseRule.description: Luka taunt using Chloe Burgess TranScribe. Player is in Deep Storage.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Exterior Taunt #1
ResponseRule.description: Luka taunt using Chloe Burgess TranScribe. Player is in Deep Storage.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Elevator Restored
ResponseRule.description: Luka taunt after elevator power is restored.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Elevator Bomb Triggered
ResponseRule.description: Player tripped booby trap Luka left in the elevator.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Elevator Bomb Disarmed
ResponseRule.description: Player disarmed booby trap Luka left in the elevator.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Threat #1
ResponseRule.description: Luka ranting and threatening. Can be played anywhere.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: After Players Next Vision
ResponseRule.description: Luka threat that plays after the player has a vision.

ResponseRule.name: Luka TS: Luka's Story
ResponseRule.description: Luka leaves a narrative for Morgan on Chloe's transcribe. Story of what happened to him. Part of him suspects Morgan might finish him off and he doesn't want him to forget.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player enters cafeteria
ResponseRule.description: When the player enters the cafeteria, Luka is busy fending off some telepath controlled humans from the glass.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: Player enters cafeteria, loiters
ResponseRule.description: When the player enters the cafeteria, Luka is busy fending off some telepath controlled humans from the glass. If the player sticks around, Luka addresses the telepath victims once more before they detonate.

ResponseRule.name: Luka shouts the telepath is dead, lot of mind-controlled humans killed.
Luka: PA While Plyr Is Headed to Mitchell's Room
ResponseRule.description: Luka comes over PA when player is going down corridor to Mitchell's Room (optional). This should cue before player actually enters corridor with Voltaic.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: PA While Plyr Is Headed Back With Award
ResponseRule.description: Luka comes over PA when player is going down corridor to Mitchell's Room (optional). This should cue before player actually enters corridor with Voltaic.

ResponseRule.name: Luka: PA When Player Enter's Dining Room With Award
ResponseRule.description: When player enters dining room
